lead_paragraph: Manchester City midfielder Kevin De Bruyne will be out for about 10 weeks after tearing ankle and knee ligaments in Wednesday's League Cup semi-final win against Everton, he tweeted on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Man City's De Bruyne Out for About 10 Weeks
headline.main: Man City's De Bruyne Out for About 10 Weeks
